title: Guess Who?

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, select two players to face off in Guess Who?. The next day, they will be forced into a Guess Who match.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The rules of the game are as follows:
> - Each player will select a non-good-faction role to be their "who". This must be selected before the game begins. **Players may select a good faction that didn't initially spawn.** 
> - A channel will be made that neither of the players can talk in, however they will be able to relay messages into the channel anonymously. All players will be able to spectate the channel.
> - You select one person to go first. Starting with them, players alternate asking yes or no questions regarding the other person's role choice, and the host OR the other player will answer the question truthfully. If the player answers and lies, they **die.**
> - Whoever guesses the opponent's choice first wins. The winner will be converted into the role that they chose. Nothing happens to the loser.
> - Each player has a limit of twenty questions. If this limit is reached by both players with no winner, both players **die.**
> - If the day ends with no winner, both players **die.**

fields.name: Attributes 2:
fields.value:
- You may perform your ability once when dead.
- Anyone who claims they are a player at any point is instantly dealt an Overoverkill attack, and the game is cancelled. The host may censor any message that reveals the author.
- If the game is not resolved halfway through the day, you may reset the game with two new players.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the good faction that initially spawned lose the game.
